== WHEREAREWE.m ==
Give a back a string function of your location

[http://guillaumemaze.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/matlab/routines/wherearewe.m Download here]

{{{
% WHEREAREWE Give a back a string function of your location
%
% LOCATION = wherearewe()
%
% This function (you need to customize) gives back
% a string based on the output of getcomputername.
% This is useful if you run your scripts on different
% system or network.
%
% LOCATION could be:
%	csail_mit
%	ocean
%	altix
%	csail_ao
%	beagle
%
}}}
